attributes.action: NATO forces to enter Ukraine and to protect their borders with Russia
attributes.additional_details:
We have all seen over the past 4 months what Vladimir Putin has done. He has invaded Crimea and is now intent on influencing violence and the on-going war between Ukrainian soldiers and militia from Russia who are being provided with Russian military vehicles and sophisticated weaponry.

Ukraine are struggling to protect their borders and it's about time NATO assisted with military action in Ukraine to protect their borders and to ensure security for NATO countries.
